sentences.sContent: Outside, a flock of white birds dip over gray-tiled rooftops and persimmon trees.
sentences.sContent_eng: Outside, a flock of white birds dip over gray-tiled rooftops and persimmon trees.
sentences.sCn: 窗外，一群白色的鸽子停在灰色的屋瓦上，点缀在柿子树丛里。

sentences.sContent: Dried persimmon, however, can be consumed for six months if kept away from sunshine and damp.
sentences.sContent_eng: Dried persimmon, however, can be consumed for six months if kept away from sunshine and damp.
sentences.sCn: 新鲜柿子可以做成柿饼，在阴凉干燥的环境下，可以保存六个月。

trans.tranOther: a soft orange-coloured fruit that grows in hot countries
